vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding consideration of amending permanent and temporary concrete or asphalt batching plant uses, including but not limited to amending potentially incompatible industrial uses, in the Dallas Development Code Chapter 51 and 51A
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval, as briefed per staff’s recommendations
Recommendation of Staff and CPC:  Approval
DCA201-003(LL) DCA212-003(LL)
